item.title: Planning thoughts for Quant UX Con 2023
item.description: Quant UX Con started in June 2022. It is the first-ever conference devoted to the practice of Quant UX research. Quant UX Con 2023 will occur June 14-15 online, worldwide, in all time zones. In 2022, we planned the first year to occur in person and expected 200 attendees. But when the number of interested sign-ups passed 1000 we realized a new plan was needed. So we pivoted to an almost-all-online format and ended up with more than 2500 attendees, plus 12 in-person watch parties across the US and Europe.
